title: What makes a hero?
description: What trials unite not only Harry Potter or Frodo Baggins but many of literature's most interesting heroes? And what do ordinary people have in common with these literary heroes? Matthew Winkler takes us step-by-step through the crucial events that make or break a hero. [Directed by Kirill Yeretsky, narrated by Matthew Winkler, music by Stephen LaRosa].
author: Matthew Winkler
keywords: TED, talks, TED-Ed, storytelling, literature, personal growth
